properties.ADU Min. Parking Spaces Units: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
properties.PRD Max. Density: DRB can permit a density of up to 100% over base district density
properties.Special Notes: Site plan approval has public hearings.
properties.Tooltip Notes: Lot Coverage (Buildings and Impervious Surfaces): 80% for lots <0.25 acres; 70% or 0.2 acres for lots >=0.25 & <0.5 acres; 60% or 0.35 acres for lots >=0.5 & <1 acre; 45% or 0.6 acres for lots >1 acre.
